about_the_game:
This free DLC invites you on an odyssey through six distinct and immersive conclusions. Choose your path – whether it's a tranquil existence within a loving family or a thrilling adventure filled with passion, novel fetishes, and astonishing revelations.

Ending-12: "Redhead Resort"

Immerse yourself in events related to Allison and Vanessa. This ending promises a sensual and extraordinary journey, full of passion and unveiling unexpected secrets.



Ending-14: "Polly & Nora"

Experience the tender and affectionate conclusion with Polly and Nora. This ending is filled with care and love, offering a sea of tranquility and relaxation.



Ending-11: "Red Diamond"

Embark on an unexplored journey in Daisy's captivating solo story. This ending allows you to peer into the distant future of the protagonist and their chosen companion. Rich in personal revelations and character development, this ending is perfect for the Daisy lovers out there.



Ending-17: "Not Guilty"

Join Dahlia in an emotionally charged adventure. Exploring new frontiers of for a great Dom/Sub relationship and other fetishes involving control and submission. This ending promises numerous surprises and shocking content.



Ending-7: "A New Chair"

Embark on a journey into the sanctuary of the once demure Lydia. In this ending, you'll bear witness to the captivating transformation as the seemingly modest Lydia ascends to the throne of desire and takes her rightful place as your decadent and authoritative queen. Dive into an incredible culmination where the lascivious reign of Queen Lydia dominates you from her mighty throne.



Ending-4: "My Sex Dungeon"

An extravagant life amidst incredible beauties is within your reach. AmRose, Stacey, Daisy, Lyssa, and Maria can form the start of your personal sex dungeon. Five distinct and exquisite beauties shower their attention and passion upon you in this ending. Immerse yourself in as the Master of the House and savor tons of kinky scenes with captivating animations.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults only. The characters depicted in the game are 18 years old of age or older. 

Includes explicit sexual content and behavior some viewers may find offensive or disturbing. Characters engage in oral, vaginal, and anal sex acts, as well as non-penetrative sexual acts. There are scenes of sexual intercourse with pregnant characters. Bondage, sexual domination and submission, pet play, the use of sex toys, bodily fluids, urination, and alternative sexual lifestyles are portrayed.

Strong language is frequently used throughout. Mature themes, such as blackmailing, drugs, and non-consensual sex, are mentioned. The game contains use of alcohol and tobacco. 

The story, characters, names, and actions are fictitious, and any similarity to real life is coincidental and unintended.

detailed_description:
Featured DLC


Join our Discord


MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION

Embark on a journey into the realm of passion and desire with bold new content for Fetish Locator Week 3.

This DLC features scenes tailored for a mature audience and content that is not suitable for all age groups. Each event in the game unfolds solely through the mutual consent of the characters, ensuring a respectful approach to each character.

short_description: Explore new additional endings in Fetish Locator Week 3's free DLC! Uncover 6 additional endings as you reconnect with beloved characters. Your in-game choices shape the available outcomes! Immerse yourself in fresh content and relish the impact of your decisions.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
